mapper.sql: arrangement_id, project_id, referee_id, type_id, info_id, `type`, is_cancel, reason, create_time, update_time, other
mapper.select: select * from tb_arrangement JOIN tb_athlete ON tb_arrangement.type_id = tb_athlete.athlete_id JOIN tb_student ON tb_athlete.student_id = tb_student.student_id where project_id = #{projectId}
mapper.insert:
insert into tb_arrangement

referee_id,

info_id,

is_cancel,
reason,

update_time,
other,

mapper.update:
update tb_arrangement
project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
referee_id = #{refereeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
info_id = #{infoId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
`type` = #{type,jdbcType=CHAR},
is_cancel = #{isCancel,jdbcType=CHAR},
reason = #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
other = #{other,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where arrangement_id = #{arrangementId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_arrangement set project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, referee_id = #{refereeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, info_id = #{infoId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `type` = #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, is_cancel = #{isCancel,jdbcType=CHAR}, reason = #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, other = #{other,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where arrangement_id = #{arrangementId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
